refnamediv.refpurpose: This object represents data defined on a mesh_im object.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: MIMD = gf_mesh_im_data(mesh_im mim, int region, ivec size)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This object represents data defined on a mesh_im object.

para.literal: MIMD = gf_mesh_im_data(mesh_im mim, int region, ivec size)

listitem.para: Build a new mesh_imd object linked to a mesh_im object. If region is provided, considered integration points are filtered in this region. size is a vector of integers that specifies the dimensions of the stored data per integration point. If not given, the scalar stored data are considered.
